name: Mario (8-Bit)
description: The classic 8-bit version of Mario, the iconic hero of the Mushroom Kingdom, also appearing in the Cap Kingdom for nostalgic adventures.

name: Big Chain Chomp
description: A massive and menacing Chain Chomp used by Bowser to guard his fortress, also found in the ruins of the Ruined Kingdom.

name: Bird (Forest)
description: A small bird commonly found in the forests of the Wooded Kingdom, also seen in the Mushroom Kingdom's wooded areas.

name: Bird (Eagle)
description: A majestic eagle soaring high above the clouds in the Cloud Kingdom, occasionally spotted near the waterfalls of the Cascade Kingdom.

name: Bird (Lake)
description: A graceful bird often seen near the tranquil waters of the Lake Kingdom, also found along the shores of the Seaside Kingdom.

name: Bird (Gull)
description: A seagull flying over the beaches and oceans of the Seaside Kingdom, occasionally visiting the Lake Kingdom.

name: Bird (Lava)
description: A fiery bird adapted to the extreme heat of the Luncheon Kingdom's lava-filled terrain, also seen in Bowser's Kingdom.

name: Bird (Sand)
description: A desert bird thriving in the arid environment of the Sand Kingdom, also found in the ruins of the Ruined Kingdom.

name: Bird (Snow)
description: A hardy bird that endures the cold climate of the Snow Kingdom, occasionally seen in the Mushroom Kingdom during winter.

name: Bird (Waterfall)
description: A bird often seen near the cascading waterfalls of the Cascade Kingdom, also found near the Lake Kingdom's waters.

name: Bomb Tail
description: A creature with a bomb-like tail, often found in the Cap Kingdom, also used by Bowser's forces in his kingdom.

name: Bonneton Female
description: A female resident of Bonneton, the main town in the Cap Kingdom, occasionally visiting the Mushroom Kingdom.

name: Bonneton Male
description: A male resident of Bonneton, the main town in the Cap Kingdom, occasionally visiting the Mushroom Kingdom.

name: Bowser
description: The King of the Koopas and Mario's arch-nemesis, often seen in his kingdom but also invading the Mushroom Kingdom.

name: Bowser (Ball A)
description: A spherical form of Bowser used in certain battles, also appearing in the Ruined Kingdom.

name: Bowser (Ball B)
description: Another spherical form of Bowser with enhanced abilities, also appearing in the Ruined Kingdom.

name: Bowser (Hat)
description: Bowser's special hat, granting him unique powers, also seen in the Cap Kingdom.

name: Bowser (Suit)
description: Bowser in a magnificent suit, often seen in his kingdom but also making appearances in the Metro Kingdom.

name: Breeda
description: An antagonist who causes trouble and challenges Mario throughout his journey, appearing in both the Cap and Moon Kingdoms.

name: Breeda (Wanwan)
description: Breeda's playful dog companion, Wanwan, often seen in the Mushroom Kingdom but also accompanying Breeda in the Cap Kingdom.

name: Breeda (Wanwan Break)
description: Wanwan taking a break from its playful antics, often seen in the Mushroom Kingdom but also in the Cap Kingdom.

name: Burrbo
description: A small, burrowing creature found in grassy areas of the Mushroom Kingdom, also seen in the Wooded Kingdom.

name: Burrbo (Ruined Kingdom)
description: A variant of Burrbo adapted to the ruins of the Ruined Kingdom, also found in the Sand Kingdom.

name: Byugo
description: A large, aquatic creature found in the waters of the Lake Kingdom, also seen in the Seaside Kingdom.

name: Cappy
description: A sentient hat that helps Mario on his adventures by possessing enemies and objects, primarily found in the Cap Kingdom but also assisting in the Mushroom Kingdom.

name: Captain Toad
description: A brave and resourceful Toad who embarks on his own adventures, often seen in the Mushroom Kingdom but also exploring the Cascade Kingdom.

name: Catch Bomb
description: A bomb-like enemy that can be caught and thrown, primarily found in Bowser's Kingdom but also appearing in the Ruined Kingdom.

name: Chain Chomp
description: A ferocious, ball-and-chain enemy often used as a guard in Bowser's Kingdom, also seen in the Mushroom Kingdom.

name: Chargin' Chuck
description: A football-themed Koopa Troopa known for charging at enemies, primarily found in the Mushroom Kingdom but also in Bowser's Kingdom.

name: Collect Animal
description: A small, collectible creature found throughout the kingdoms, often seen in the Mushroom Kingdom but also in the Wooded Kingdom.

name: Desert Man
description: A resident of the Sand Kingdom, adapted to the desert environment, also found in the Ruined Kingdom.

name: Desert Man (L)
description: A larger variant of the Desert Man, primarily found in the Sand Kingdom but also in the Ruined Kingdom.

name: Donsuke
description: A friendly NPC who offers quests and rewards, often seen in the Mushroom Kingdom but also in the Cap Kingdom.

name: Doshi
description: A wise NPC who provides guidance and information, primarily found in the Mushroom Kingdom but also in the Cap Kingdom.

name: Fuzzy
